data.title: UGANDA Definition & Meaning
data.meta_description: Uganda definition: an independent state in E Africa, between the NE Democratic Republic of the Congo and Kenya: member of the Commonwealth of Nations; formerly a British protectorate. 91,065 sq. mi. (241,068 sq. km). Capital. See examples of UGANDA used in a sentence.
data.text:
Discover More

Fewer than half the people in Uganda owned cell phones at that time.

Uganda’s action isn’t even the latest example of a blackout.

In Uganda, a parallel digital conflict is playing out in quite a different way.

Given the impending election in Uganda, we moved quickly to investigate and take down this network.
